channel.title: Port Forwarding!
channel.description:
I posted this on another section, but I think this ones better. [quote="emin3m5236"]This is my problem, for the past 3 days i have been trying to port forward my server. To make it no-ip. I have tryed everything. I have the DUC running perfectly. I went to portworward.com and i have gotten their softwear. it says its port forwarded, but i cant even connect to my own server through no-ip.biz.
1st what i do is, i go to START, click RUN, type cmd.
[IMG]http://i2.tinypic.com/66nllr7.jpg[/img]
Than my default gateway, ip address and pretty much all my info pops up like it is supposed to.
[IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/4oraed0.jpg[/img]
Next, I type the DEFAULT GATEWAY in my browser.
[IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/6btdlja.jpg[/img]
Now, with linkys router, a log in screen should pop up, BUT I don't have a linkys router i have a 2wire. and this is the screen that i get once i type in the default gateway.
[IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/4m0qveh.jpg[/img]
AND lastly, I have no clue where do i port forward it now. If anyone could help with this that would be great. Please do not spam.
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:18:04 AM[/size][hr]Wow, no one answered yet. *confused*[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:50:11 AM[/size][hr]Oh geez. No one knows how to fix this?[/quote]

item.title: Port Forwarding!
item.dc:creator: @emin3m5236 emin3m5236
item.description:
@emin3m5236 wrote:

I posted this on another section, but I think this ones better.

[quote=“emin3m5236”]This is my problem, for the past 3 days i have been trying to port forward my server. To make it no-ip.
I have tryed everything. I have the DUC running perfectly. I went to portworward.com and i have gotten their softwear. it says its port forwarded, but i cant even connect to my own server through no-ip.biz.

1st what i do is, i go to START, click RUN, type cmd.

Than my default gateway, ip address and pretty much all my info pops up like it is supposed to.

Next, I type the DEFAULT GATEWAY in my browser.

Now, with linkys router, a log in screen should pop up, BUT I don’t have a linkys router i have a 2wire. and this is the screen that i get once i type in the default gateway.

AND lastly, I have no clue where do i port forward it now. If anyone could help with this that would be great. Please do not spam.

[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:18:04 AM[/size][hr]Wow, no one answered yet. confused[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 09:50:11 AM[/size][hr]Oh geez. No one knows how to fix this?[/quote]
